snippet.title: Clash: Heroes Of Feralia Terra | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are pleased to unveil our latest trailer. Experience a first look at the universe of #ClashHOFT, inspired by the works of Robert E. Howard. 
Get ready for a brutal, feral action and immersive gameplay as Feral Warriors in our debut Action RPG IP, CLASH: Heroes Of Feralia Terra.

Your journey into the realm of #ClashHOFT begins here.
Enjoy the trailer, follow and prepare for the challenges ahead.
Your feedback is invaluable to us.

A third-person survival action shooter and slasher, set in a world besieged by cosmic alien creatures. As the final hope of your world, you shall venture forth alone or with others to confront the hordes of deadly cosmic foes and formidable bosses, striving to survive and save your world.

FOLLOW FOR DAILY CONTENT : https://linktr.ee/Artnrollgames

WISHLIST 
STEAM STORE : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2512550/CLASH/
EPIC GAMES : https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/clash-5f995e

#Artnrollgames #UE5 #indiegame #ClashHOFT

Original Music
Fran Soto/Epic Soul Factory
Sound Design/Mixing/Artnroll Games
Alex Papadopoulos
